Plot: Sports agent Liz Darnell will do anything to win back her number-one client, baseball pro Gavin Riley. And Gavin's more than ready- especially when Liz is offering herself as part of the bargain. But when love unexpectedly enters the playing field, neither Liz nor Gavin are ready for the biggest game-changer of all.
Characters: Mick Riley, Tara Lincoln, Elizabeth Darnell, Gavin Riley, Jenna Riley, Tyler Anderson, Nathan Lincoln, Kathleen Riley, Jimmy Riley, Dedrick Coleman, Shawnelle Coleman, Tommy Maloney, Haley Maloney
Setting: St. Louis, Missouri (United States), Florida (United States)
